extDesc.message: A simple password manager to save and fill login credentials for websites.

popupTitle.description: The title of the popup window.

exportButton.description: The text on the export button.

noPasswords.description: The message shown when there are no passwords.

fillButton.description: The text on the fill button.

deleteButton.description: The text on the delete button.

exportAlert.description: The alert message when there are no passwords to export.
